mapper.sql: id, name, pid, order, level, desc, path, isdisplay, makedate, modifydate
mapper.insert: insert into menu (id, name, pid, order, level, desc, path, isdisplay, makedate, modifydate) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdisplay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{makedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into menu
id,
name,
pid,
order,
level,
desc,
path,
isdisplay,
makedate,
modifydate,

mapper.update:
update menu
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isdisplay = #{isdisplay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
makedate = #{makedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifydate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
